rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OCC4081}
Must be enrolled in course version {3869, M3001}
(Any co-req (I/W) unit in {OCC4092} and Any co-req (I/W) unit in {OCC4071, OCC4091})

description: The unit comprises 9 weeks of fieldwork placement followed by on campus debriefing tutorials. The unit provides students with the opportunity to develop, integrate and enhance their practice skills to reach an entry level of competence in occupational therapy prior to graduation. By the end of the fieldwork placement students will be managing a caseload of clients independently. A learning contract developed in OCC4081 will be used to guide fieldwork learning. A portfolio assessment will be used to encourage reflection, a self-directed approach to learning and to provide a record of professional competencies as these are developing.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
